textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Inspired by her worldly travels, designer Rory Edelman's fashion career began when Friends stylist Deb McGuire bought her hand-knit scarves to be used on the show. Rory's knit creations soon became an L.A. phenomenon, and she went on to launch her first collection under the name Rory Beca in summer 2006. Rory Beca features vintage-inspired, wearable fashions with a feminine edge for styles that are timelessly chic. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free.
